title: Great boutique hotel in an excellent location with attentive concierge service!!
text:
My new husband and I arrived at The Archer and spent a week there celebrating our honeymoon! It was our first time in NYC and even before we arrived the hotel staff responded to our emails and request for a room upgrade with a view of the Empire State Building, and as a treat to celebrate our honeymoon, Archer gifted the upgrade to us as a Wedding present. Not only that but arranged for a bottle of bubbly and chocolate dipped strawberries from the in house Fabric Restaurant that were absolutely delicious!!
If the management of Archer reward staff for excellent, attentive service, than we would like to say a very special thank you to PAUL on reception. From the moment we arrived from the UK and during our stay Paul was warm, kind and informative. The behind the scene's staff in office and the housekeeping were attentive and looked after us, thank you too! Fantastic, comfortable room and bed, fantastic view, hotel close to all amenities. Looking out at the EPS each night, was a dream come true! Thank you all!
Mary & Chris, Herefordshire, UK
